greeting.heading: Happy Pongal!
greeting.message: Celebrate Pongal and rejoice the charm of our tradition!

about.heading: About Pongal
about.content: Pongal is more than just a festival; itâ€™s a joyful celebration of life, gratitude, nature, and community. It serves as a reminder of the deep connection between humans and nature and the importance of thanking the land and livestock that sustain life.
